allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Coffee Suggester app

A friendly web app that helps casual coffee drinkers discover their perfect coffee.

Features:
- Guided quiz \(3-5 adaptive questions\)
- Personalized recommendations with explainable scoring
- Brew tips for any equipment
- Cafe finder via OpenStreetMap
- Shareable results URLs
- Privacy-first admin dashboard

Tech stack:
- Next.js 14 \(App Router\), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
- Prisma with SQLite \(PostgreSQL ready\)
- Vitest for testing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
